commit.message:
Fix memory leak in tree-ssa-loop-unswitch.c

2017-02-14  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

	* tree-ssa-loop-unswitch.c (hoist_guard): Release get_loop_body
	vector.  Fix trailing white spaces.
